AT.name: Balloon Kid™
AT.description: Schwinge dich in die Lüfte und reise durch ein Land voller Gefahren. Du hältst dich aber nur mit Hilfe von Ballons in der Luft! Alice muss ihren vom Wind davongetragenen Bruder retten, indem sie durch acht abenteuerliche Stages schwebt. Navigiere geschickt an Gegnern und Hindernissen vorbei und sammele Ballons, um Boni zu erhalten oder lasse deine Ballons los, um dich Gegnern am Boden zu stellen. Oder versuche dich im Balloon Trip-Modus an immer schwieriger werdenden Leveln und steige in der Rangliste auf. Nimmst du die stürmische Herausforderung an?

CY.name: Balloon Kid™
CY.description: Take to the skies on a trip through a land filled with danger, with nothing but balloons to keep you afloat! When her brother is swept away on the wind, Alice must save him by floating through eight perilous stages. Navigate your way through enemies and obstacles, collect balloons to earn bonuses, or let go of your balloons to face enemies on the ground. Also, in Balloon Trip mode, negotiate increasingly tricky levels to earn a high score and move up the ranks. Will you rise to the challenge?

BE.name: Balloon Kid™
BE.description: Flottez à l'aide de vos ballons et survolez un monde aux mille dangers ! Alice doit s'envoler à travers huit stages périlleux pour sauver son petit frère emporté par le vent. Évitez les obstacles et les créatures sur votre chemin, ramassez les ballons pour obtenir des bonus ou lâchez-les pour combattre vos ennemis au sol. Dans le mode Balloon Trip, traversez des stages de plus en plus difficiles pour obtenir le meilleur score et améliorer votre classement. Serez-vous à la hauteur ?

MT.name: Balloon Kid™
MT.description: Take to the skies on a trip through a land filled with danger, with nothing but balloons to keep you afloat! When her brother is swept away on the wind, Alice must save him by floating through eight perilous stages. Navigate your way through enemies and obstacles, collect balloons to earn bonuses, or let go of your balloons to face enemies on the ground. Also, in Balloon Trip mode, negotiate increasingly tricky levels to earn a high score and move up the ranks. Will you rise to the challenge?

IT.name: Balloon Kid™
IT.description: Librati in volo grazie a dei semplici palloncini e affronta un lungo viaggio pieno di pericoli! Una raffica di vento ha portato via il fratellino di Alice e la nostra eroina deve salvarlo, fluttuando lungo otto pericolosi livelli. Fatti strada tra nemici e ostacoli, lascia volare via i tuoi palloncini per affrontare i nemici a terra e raccogli tanti palloncini extra per ottenere vari bonus! Infine, scala la classifica grazie alla modalità Balloon Trip, in cui dovrai superare vari livelli a difficoltà crescente. Volerai tanto in alto da superare la sfida?

NO.name: Balloon Kid™
NO.description: Take to the skies on a trip through a land filled with danger, with nothing but balloons to keep you afloat! When her brother is swept away on the wind, Alice must save him by floating through eight perilous stages. Navigate your way through enemies and obstacles, collect balloons to earn bonuses, or let go of your balloons to face enemies on the ground. Also, in Balloon Trip mode, negotiate increasingly tricky levels to earn a high score and move up the ranks. Will you rise to the challenge?

NL.name: Balloon Kid™
NL.description: Stijg op en ga op avontuur in een land vol gevaren en met niets anders dan ballonnen om je in de lucht te houden! Wanneer haar broertje door de wind is meegenomen, zal Alice hem moeten redden door zich al zwevend door acht levensgevaarlijke levels te manouveren. Beweeg jezelf langs vijanden en obstakels, verzamel ballonnen voor bonuspunten of laat je ballonnen los om de strijd aan te gaan met je vijanden op de grond. Speel ook de spelstand Balloon Trip waarin je steeds moeilijkere levels moet doorkruisen om hoger op de ranglijst te eindigen. Kan jij boven jezelf uitstijgen?

ES.name: Balloon Kid™
ES.description: ¡Surca los cielos en un viaje a través de los páramos más peligrosos con la única ayuda de unos pequeños globos para mantenerte a flote! Cuando el viento arrastra a su hermano, a Alice no le queda más remedio que lanzarse en su búsqueda a lo largo de ocho peligrosos niveles. Ábrete paso esquivando los enemigos y obstáculos que encuentres en tu camino, coge todos los globos que puedas para hacerte con las bonificaciones o suelta tus globos para aterrizar y enfrentarte con los enemigos terrestres. Además, en el modo Viaje en globo, tendrás que abrirte camino por niveles cada vez más complicados para hacerte con la máxima puntuación posible y subir de rango. ¡Déjate llevar por la aventura!

SK.name: Balloon Kid™
SK.description: Take to the skies on a trip through a land filled with danger, with nothing but balloons to keep you afloat! When her brother is swept away on the wind, Alice must save him by floating through eight perilous stages. Navigate your way through enemies and obstacles, collect balloons to earn bonuses, or let go of your balloons to face enemies on the ground. Also, in Balloon Trip mode, negotiate increasingly tricky levels to earn a high score and move up the ranks. Will you rise to the challenge?

PL.description: Take to the skies on a trip through a land filled with danger, with nothing but balloons to keep you afloat! Navigate your way through enemies and obstacles, collect balloons to earn bonuses, or let go of your balloons to face enemies on the ground. Also, in Balloon Trip mode, negotiate increasingly tricky levels to earn a high score and move up the ranks. Will you rise to the challenge?

RU.name: Balloon Kid™
RU.description: Возьмите в руки воздушные шары и воспарите над землей, исполненной опасностей! Alice отправляется на поиски брата, которого унес ураган. Впереди у нее – восемь уровней, где девочку ждет множество врагов и препятствий. Пройдите с ней этот путь! Собирайте шары, чтобы заработать бонусы, и иногда спускайтесь на землю, чтобы сразиться с врагами! В режиме Balloon Trip вам нужно набрать как можно больше очков, проходя уровни с возрастающей сложностью. Вы готовы к полету?

SI.name: Balloon Kid™
SI.description: Take to the skies on a trip through a land filled with danger, with nothing but balloons to keep you afloat! When her brother is swept away on the wind, Alice must save him by floating through eight perilous stages. Navigate your way through enemies and obstacles, collect balloons to earn bonuses, or let go of your balloons to face enemies on the ground. Also, in Balloon Trip mode, negotiate increasingly tricky levels to earn a high score and move up the ranks. Will you rise to the challenge?

PT.name: Balloon Kid
PT.description: Vai até aos céus numa viagem ao longo de um caminho repleto de perigos, flutuando apenas com a ajuda de balões! Quando o seu irmão é levado pelo vento, Alice deve salvá-lo flutuando através de oito perigosos níveis. Navega através de inimigos e obstáculos, coleciona balões para ganhares bónus ou solta os balões para defrontares os teus inimigos no solo. Além disso, no modo Balloon Trip, supera níveis com dificuldade crescente para obteres uma pontuação elevada e subires de categoria. Será que consegues estar à altura do desafio?
